title: nee parakramamu
sahitya:
nI parAkramamu evarikunnadayya



anupallavi



 nApai daya jEyavE nAtha jagadIshvarA



caraNam 1



 pApa hara nI nAmamucE bANa rAvaNAduDu E pagidini munu varamula nandiri

E punavara savyasAciyunu ninnu meppinci nI sharaNamu pondagAlEdA

   

caraNam 2



 bhAnukOTi prakAsha praNatArtihara ninnE mAnaka nE bhajinci mIritinO jagadIshA 

dInuDagu tyAgarAja hrdaya nivAsa sannuta munijana sura pAlaka shankara
